meanings.definition: The quality or state of being brutal or savage.
meanings.sent1: His brutishnesses were evident in his violent outbursts.
meanings.sent2: The jungle was filled with the brutishnesses of wild animals.
meanings.sent3: The brutishnesses of the bear made him the least popular animal at the zoo.
meanings.sent4: The brutishnesses of the storm left a path of destruction in its wake.
meanings.sent5: The brutishnesses of the dictator's regime were felt by all who opposed him.

meanings.definition: Acts or behaviors characteristic of a brute or savage.
meanings.sent1: The brutishnesses of the bully scared the other kids on the playground.
meanings.sent2: The brutishnesses of the warrior were unmatched in battle.
meanings.sent3: Despite his brutishnesses, the ogre had a soft spot for kittens.
meanings.sent4: The brutishnesses of the criminal gang struck fear into the hearts of the townspeople.
meanings.sent5: The brutishnesses of the caveman were a stark contrast to the sophistication of modern society.
